concept.title: Using the Graph
concept.shortdesc: The quickest and most intuitive way to manipulate the dataset is directly in the graph.

copyright.copyrholder: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

conbody.p: Almost all actions can be performed on the nodes either through a single click or a "drag and drop."
conbody.note: The exception is Label and Hide, which can only be performed in the Commands Tab.

p.note: Nodes can be dragged between any of the three main areas: central Graph, Shelf and Discard Bin.
